name: PHILADELPHIA FEDERATION OF TEACHERS, LOCAL 3, Appellant, v. SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA
name_abbreviation: Philadelphia Federation of Teachers, Local 3 v. School District

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
parties: PHILADELPHIA FEDERATION OF TEACHERS, LOCAL 3, Appellant, v. SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NEWMAN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Ralph J. Teti and Linda M. Martin, Philadelphia, for Appellant.
Vincent J. Salandria, Philadelphia, for Appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
701 A.2d 1357
PHILADELPHIA FEDERATION OF TEACHERS, LOCAL 3, Appellant, v. SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PHILADELPHIA.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 20, 1997.
Decided Nov. 14, 1997.
Ralph J. Teti and Linda M. Martin, Philadelphia, for Appellant.
Vincent J. Salandria, Philadelphia, for Appellee.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
